thread.title: HotelQuickly Uses Transpay for Sending Mass Payments to Asia-Pacific Member Hotels
thread.title_full: HotelQuickly Uses Transpay for Sending Mass Payments to Asia-Pacific Member Hotels - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: HotelQuickly Uses Transpay for Sending Mass Payments to Asia-Pacific Member Hotels
text:
Transpay
Transpay also enables international payroll for HotelQuickly
NEW YORK , Sept. 21, Transpay , a leading provider of B2B/B2C cross-border payments based in New York , will enable payouts to Southeast Asia and Europe for HotelQuickly , a mobile application for booking last-minute hotel rooms throughout the Asia-Pacific region.
Logo - http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20150918/268185LOGO
Transpay said it was pleased to partner with HotelQuickly, a service available in more than 250 destinations across 15 Asian countries. As the world's largest, independent bank payout network, Transpay's payment platform will enable HotelQuickly to pay their hotel network through direct bank deposits in local currency.
"Transpay has helped us simplify our mass payments, which used to be costly and time-consuming," says Mario Peng , Co-Founder and CFO of HotelQuickly. "The service has allowed us to send faster payments to our hotel groups without hidden fees."
HotelQuickly has also adopted Transpay for their international payroll.
" Asia Pac presents special challenges when it comes to mass payments," says Nagarajan Rao , Senior Vice President of Transpay. "We are excited to be solving those challenges for HotelQuickly and look forward to growing our relationship in the years to come."
About Transpay
Transpay, headquartered in New York City , is a division of TRANSFAST, LLC, a regulated financial institution and money transfer business. Transpay provides global STP (Straight Through Processing) services through API integrations, batch-file processing, and the world's first pay-by-email Mass Payout Platform. Transpay's proprietary payments network spans more than 100 countries in Asia , Latin America , Europe and Africa .
Transpay makes the complex global payments landscape user-friendly with secure, fully compliant, easy-to-use solutions. For more information, please visit www.transpay.global or call 212-994-0345.
About HotelQuickly
Available in more than 250+ destinations in 15 countries across Asia-Pacific , HotelQuickly aims to help travelers get great hotel deals even on last minute travel plans. With HotelQuickly, users can book hotels in exciting destinations from Bali to Brisbane . Available in 9 languages, the app is easy to use for travelers around the world.
For more information, visit www.hotelquickly.com .
